name: Freaky Foods
description:
This is a game where you click on foods to earn scores. Game will end if you fail to prevent a food from falling.  You can also click on the bombs to destroy them but it will count a negative score.

Objectives:

  • Destroy foods to earn points as well as prevent them from falling
  • Avoid the bombs
  • Reach a high  score
  • Try Medium or Hard modes

Any feedback will be appreciated. Thanks for playing.

recommendation: use fullscreen mode
